Name: Encounter: Wildfire
Description: Before time passes, you lose the game if there are seven or more 🔥 on the field.

Name: The Firestarter
Description:
This enemy gets +X 🗡️, where X is the number of 🔥 on the field.
This enemy gets +X ❤️, where X is two times the number of 🔥 on the field.

Name: Fuel for the Fire
Description:
Don't remove ⏳ from other durations during the night's time passes step.
You can't remove ⏳ from other durations.

Name: Smoke Inhalation
Description: After you play an action, discard one of the resources used to play it.

Name: Smoldering Coals
Description: If you would recover X vitality, you may remove X ⏳ from this duration instead.

Name: Swirling Ashes
Description: Before time passes, this deals 1 damage.

Name: Encroaching Flames
Description:
You may deal damage to this as if it were an enemy. If you do, remove X ⏳ from it, where X is the damage dealt.
Before time passes, if there is exactly 1 ⏳ on this, it deals 6 damage.

Name: Heat Wave
Description:
This deals X damage, where X is the number of 🔥 on the field. 
If there are less than four 🔥 on the field, Surge.

Name: Emberling
Description:
If there are 5 or more 🔥 on the field, this enemy gets +2 🗡️.
Surge.
